mapper.sql: pb.break_bulk_id, pb.break_bulk_code, pb.work_order_id, pb.batch_no, pb.break_bulk_batch_qty, pb.status, pb.process_id, pb.organization_id, pb.create_time, pb.create_user_id, pb.modified_time, pb.modified_user_id, pb.is_delete, pb.break_bulk_type, bt.color AS 'color', spm.product_model_name AS 'productModelName', bt.material_quality AS 'materialQuality '
mapper.select:
SELECT pb.batch_no as 'batchNo',pb.break_bulk_batch_qty as 'breakBulkBatchQty',sm.material_code as 'materialCode',sm.material_name as 'materialName',sm.version,sm.material_desc as 'materialDesc',sr.route_name as 'routeName',s.user_name as 'modifiedUserName',bt.color AS 'color', spm.product_model_name AS 'productModelName', bt.material_quality AS 'materialQuality ' FROM mes_pm_break_bulk pb LEFT JOIN smt_work_order wo ON pb.work_order_id = wo.work_order_id LEFT join fantech_imes.smt_material sm on wo.material_id=sm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_tab bt on bt.material_id = sm.material_id left join smt_product_model spm on spm.product_model_id = bt.product_model_id LEFT join fantech_imes.smt_route sr on wo.route_id=sr.route_id LEFT join ocean.sys_user s on pb.modified_user_id=s.user_id
and pb.batch_no = #{batchNo}
